flawed_nl_solution:
30 x 2/5 = <<30*2/5=150/2>>150/2 members ordered lemon juice.
So, 30 - 150/2 = <<30-150/2=-45>>-45 members did not order lemon juice.
Since 1/3 of the remaining ordered mango juice, then -45 x 2/3 = <<-45*2/3=-30>>-30 members ordered mango juice.
Therefore, -45 - -30 = <<-45--30=-15>>-15 members ordered orange juice.
#### -15

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 150/2. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
